QuestData.Title: Becoming Battle-Ready
QuestData.Description: Alright, $r. I'd like to see what you're really made of.$b$bYou'll find my pupils all over the monastery. Challenge them to fights. Push them to their limits. They have been instructed to do the same to you.$b$bWin or lose, you both will come out of the fight stronger.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 8 Tian Pupils in sparring matches at the Tian Monastery.
QuestData.CompletionText: You may be a hero in your own lands, but here, you must prove your worth.
QuestData.RewardText: <Master Stone Fist eyes you warily.>$b$bAlright, I've seen enough. No more beating up on the younger pupils. We will proceed to the next phase.
